title: Leaves from the Vine

tokens.lyric: Leaves from the vine, falling so slow;

lines.raw: [A]Leaves from the vine, falling so slow;

tokens.lyric: Like fragile tiny shells, drifting in the foam.

lines.raw: [F#m]Like fragile tiny shells, drifting in the foam.

tokens.lyric: Little soldier boy, come marching home.

lines.raw: [A]Little soldier boy, come marching home.

tokens.lyric: Brave soldier boy, comes marching home.

lines.raw: [F#m]Brave soldier boy, comes marching home.

tokens.lyric: Ash in the snow, falling so slow;

lines.raw: [A]Ash in the snow, falling so slow;

tokens.lyric: Like fragile, broken hearts, with no place to go.

lines.raw: [F#m]Like fragile, broken hearts, with no place to go.

tokens.lyric: Little soldier boy, come marching home

lines.raw: [A]Little soldier boy, come marching home

tokens.lyric: Brave soldier boy, come marching home

lines.raw: [F#m]Brave soldier boy, come marching home

tokens.lyric: He thought he knew, what he was fighting for,

lines.raw: [A]He thought he knew, what he was fighting for,

tokens.lyric: But the sight of blood, made him question war.

lines.raw: [F#m]But the sight of blood, made him question war.

tokens.lyric: Poor soldier boy cold and alone

lines.raw: [A]Poor soldier boy cold and alone

tokens.lyric: Bombs fall like the rain, he's all alone.

lines.raw: [F#m]Bombs fall like the rain, he's all alone.

tokens.lyric: Those leaves did grow, from branches overgrown

lines.raw: [A]Those leaves did grow, from branches overgrown

tokens.lyric: Drifting slowly down, resting in the snow.

lines.raw: [F#m]Drifting slowly down, resting in the snow.

tokens.lyric: Little soldier boy, taken from home

lines.raw: [A]Little soldier boy, taken from home

tokens.lyric: Forced to fight a war, that is not his own.

lines.raw: [F#m]Forced to fight a war, that is not his own.

tokens.lyric: Leaves from the vine, changing so slow

lines.raw: [A]Leaves from the vine, changing so slow

tokens.lyric: Like empty, fallen souls, looking for a home.

lines.raw: [F#m]Like empty, fallen souls, looking for a home.

tokens.lyric: Little soldier boy, thought that he could soar

lines.raw: [A]Little soldier boy, thought that he could soar

tokens.lyric: Brave soldier boy, died in their
war.
